SEARCH
Package io.github.ulalax.zmq

Class Context

java.lang.Object
io.github.ulalax.zmq.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public final class Context extends Object implements AutoCloseable
ZeroMQ context. Thread-safe. Manages I/O threads and socket lifecycle.

A context is the container for all ZMQ sockets in a process. It manages I/O threads that handle asynchronous message processing.

Usage:


 try (Context context = new Context()) {
     Socket socket = new Socket(context, SocketType.REP);
     // use socket
 }
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Context

      public Context()
      Creates a new ZMQ context with default settings (1 I/O thread).
      Throws:
      ZmqException - if context creation fails

    • Context

      public Context(int ioThreads, int maxSockets)
      Creates a new ZMQ context with specified I/O threads and max sockets.
      Parameters:
      ioThreads - Number of I/O threads (default: 1)
      maxSockets - Maximum number of sockets (default: 1024)
      Throws:
      ZmqException - if context creation or option setting fails

  • Method Details

    • getOption

      public int getOption(ContextOption option)
      Gets a context option value.
      Parameters:
      option - The option to retrieve
      Returns:
      The option value
      Throws:
      ZmqException - if the operation fails
      IllegalStateException - if context is closed

    • setOption

      public void setOption(ContextOption option, int value)
      Sets a context option value.
      Parameters:
      option - The option to set
      value - The value to set
      Throws:
      ZmqException - if the operation fails
      IllegalStateException - if context is closed

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Shuts down the context without destroying it. Existing sockets can finish operations but new operations will fail.
      Throws:
      ZmqException - if the operation fails

    • has

      public static boolean has(String capability)
      Checks if a capability is available in the ZMQ library.
      Parameters:
      capability - The capability name (e.g., "curve", "ipc", "pgm")
      Returns:
      true if the capability is available

    • version

      public static Context.Version version()
      Gets the ZMQ library version.
      Returns:
      Version object with major, minor, patch

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes the context and releases all resources. All sockets must be closed before calling this.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
